## RedBlackTree.put() method

Adds or updates an element with a specified key and a value to a red black tree.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
put(key: Key, value: Value): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | Key | The key of the element to add to the red black tree. |
|  value | Value | The value of the element to add to the red black tree. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
